body_html:
If someone out there has code which uses tf.GraphKeys.TRAINABLE_RESOURCE_VARIABLES their code would break. What I meant to say is that removing tensorflow APIs since version 1.0 is not done (until 2.0).
…

Any why this PR applied would effect on a released version? The latest version seems 1.2? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
If someone out there has code which uses
tf.GraphKeys.TRAINABLE_RESOURCE_VARIABLES their code would break. What I
meant to say is that removing tensorflow APIs since version 1.0 is not done
(until 2.0).

On Wed, Jul 19, 2017 at 9:36 AM, Yazhong Liu <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> By the way, could you show which API
> would be broken on tf 1.0? Any why this PR applied would effect on a
> released version? The latest version seems 1.2?
